message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
I want a bit more, Alice. You can still get a good amount.
Let's be reasonable, Bob.  I'm willing to give you a little more, but I need a fair share too.
Come on Alice, I'm worth it. You'll still get 40 bucks.
Ok Bob, I'll meet you halfway this time.  Let's call it a day.
